tuv.seg: College application procedures and entrance requirements
Córas iarratais agus riachtanais iontrála coláistí
Describes the application procedures and entrance requirements for third-level educational institutions
Cur síos ar an gcóras iarratais agus riachtanais iontrála do na hinstitiúidí oideachais ag an tríú leibhéal
DARE admissions scheme for students with disabilities
Scéim iontrála DARE do mhic léinn míchumasacha
Supports access to third-level education for students with disabilities
Tacaíonn le rochtain ar oideachas tríú leibhéal do mhic léinn míchumasach
HEAR admissions scheme for students from disadvantaged backgrounds
Scéim iontrála HEAR do mhic léinn a bhfuil cúlra faoi mhíbhuntáiste acu
Higher Education Access Route (HEAR)is a scheme to improve access to college for school leavers from disadvantaged backgrounds
Is HEAR Bealach Rochtana ar Ardoideachas é scéim a fheabhsaíonn rochtain ar an ollscoil do lucht fágála scoile a thagann ó chúlra faoi mhíbhuntáiste
Third-level courses for mature students
Cúrsaí tríú-leibhéal do mhic léinn aibí
This document describes the different full-time and part-time educational options available to adults at third level
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar na roghanna difriúla le haghaidh oideachais lánaimseartha agus páirtaimseartha atá ar fáil do dhaoine fásta ag an tríú leibhéal
Provides free, part-time, third-level and retraining places for jobseekers and unemployed people
Cuireann áiteanna saor in aisce ar fáil ar chúrsaí ardoideachais páirtaimseartha do chuardaitheoirí poist agus do dhaoine dífhostaithe
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Táillí do scoláirí tríú leibhéal
